name: bearberry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small, short, evergreen bush (= one that never loses its leaves) with small, red or black, round fruit: Bearberry bushes are so-called because bears love to eat their berries. Bearberries grow in northern latitudes all over the world. Bearberry has historically been used for medicinal purposes.
More examplesFewer examplesI grabbed a handful of berries from a bearberry and chewed on them as I went along.The leathery leaves of the bearberries formed a dense mat beneath the trees.Arbutin, which can be extracted from the bearberry bush, prevents the formation of melanin and so is used in skin-lightening products.
